name: Unstable Truth Or Dare
description:
A game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49.

UNSTABLE TRUTH OR DARE

A truth or dare game.

Draw a random card to play Truth/Dare.

Mostly, playing a Dare Card will spawn your nightmares to the reality(Right screen) in a certain pattern. Touching them will make you lose your sanity.  You need to dodge them as fast as possible. Memorizing the nightmare pattern of each card can help a lot as well.

Playing a truth card often adds a pressure tile into your insecurity(Left screen). The tile will activate the dare effect of the original card if it falls. 

Once the tiles reach a certain height, you will overcome your insecurity and destroy all the pressure tiles inside. But be careful when stacking them, you wouldn't like it when many of them fall at the same.

Some cards has special effects that will cause you some REAL serious troubles. Watch out.

Draw as many cards as possible and keep yourself from losing mind.

Share your highest score in the comment!

GAMEPLAY

  • Click on the card pile and drag the card to the left/right to play the Truth/Dare version of the card. The card you drawn will be displayed at the right bottom.
  • Mostly, playing a Dare Card will spawn your nightmares to the reality(Right Screen) in a certain pattern. Be sure to dodge them!
  • Memorizing the nightmare pattern of each card can help you a lot in surviving. 
  • Playing a Truth card often spawns a pressure tile represents the original card. The tile will activate the dare effect of the original card when it fell.
  • Stack the pressure tiles carefully inside your insecurity(Left Screen).
  • When the tiles reach a certain height, you will overcome your insecurity and destroy all the tiles inside.
  • Be careful of some cards with special effects!

CONTROLS

Player

Move : WASD

Draw Card : MouseLeft

Pressure Tile

Move : Q, E

Rotate : Space
